content.description:
Sit start. There are three options for the sit, but then they all go to the same location. I will give beta for the option that is the most used and closest to the OG FA.

Start matched on the far right flake, go up with your left hand to a crimp, then heel hook the starting flake. Then reach over your left hand with your right hand on the crimp, adjust your feet, go left with your left hand to a gaston, and bring your right hand in close. Then toss your left hand to the sloping ledge, and then get your right hand onto a good, flat edge. Match with your right hand, move your right hand out to a small crimp, and left hell hook on arete. Reach up with your left hand to a small crimp or sidepull, then move your right hand to a money jug, keep your head, and pull the lip.
content.location:
It is about 200 yards north of

Upper Deck

and at the end of the top of tunnel 2.

content.description: Sit start with your left hand on a small crimp edge under the roof and your right hand on a good sloping hold. Get your right heel close to your right hand, and then boss up hard with your right hand to the arete, and get a pinch. From here, make your body horizontal, and do a big move out left to a super amazing, crimp edge. Do some style with your feet, bump your right hand up the arete to a worse pinch, then do a left hand toss to a small edge. Pull the lip, and do a mellow 8 more feet of climbing.

Stand start with your left hand on the far left of the horizontal crack and your right hand on the next closest, good edge on the crack. Get your left foot out on the side of the arete, bump your right hand out on the horizontal crack, match, and bump again. Then move your left heel to the starting hold, make a hard left hand move to a small sidepull, then do three right hand bumps up crimps and sidepulls. Stand up fully on the horizontal crack, and enter into a few face climbing moves until you top out.
content.location:
It is on the west side of the boulder to the left of

Upper Deck

.
